reviews.text:
One of the best Avocado drink around.. suitable for this hot weather. The boss use the real Avocado ü•ë. At only $2.50, what a bargain. Thank you boss üôèüèª

Love it!  Going to take out another cup

15th June 23 - Come back to revisit. The goodness is what makes me return again.

Bought 1 and takeaway another 2 cups. Taste superb as always!!

I am a big fan of pear juice and know its that not very common to have it at fruit juice stalls! It‚Äôs refreshing and yummyüëçüèª

Good service and from aunty and most importantly, it‚Äôs affordable!

We will most definitely come back againü•∞

The watermelon juice and dragonfruit+soursop juice are over diluted too much until two clear layers can be seen.
With ice=S$2.00, No ice=S$3.00.
I requested for no ice, but the taste are seriously watered down. This quality is unacceptable.
I know many stalls are struggling during the COVID-19 period, increase price or drop the quantity to recover their losses from the customers seems like a shortest way. However, you cannot do this in both ways to sacrifice your quality and at the same time generate double profits from the customers. It is just like doing one-time business, you will not go farther by sacrificing your reputation.

one of my favourite super yummy and creamy avocado shake!!üòã

the taste and feel are unbelievable good, but the price is unbelievable low!  i preferred the no ice version, surely recommended!!

Decent fruit juice stall where everything is $2. You can also add $1 so that there is no ice. The juice itself can be quite diluted but I guess it is reasonable for the price. They are strategically located next to the famous noo Cheng prawn noodle and you will see some of the people queuing for prawn noodle order a juice so that they can remove their masks while standing in a scorching hot Adam road food centre. I guess I did that too!
